greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T read by rows: T(n,k) = binomial(2*n+1,k)*binomial(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n.
link: Marc Chamberland and Karl Dilcher, A Binomial Sum Related to Wolstenholme's Theorem, J. Number Theory, Vol. 171, Issue 11 (Nov. 2009), pp. 2659-2672 (see Thm. 2.3).
mathematica: Flatten[Table[Binomial[2*n + 1, k]*Binomial[n, k], {n, 0, 8}, {k, 0, n}]] (* Replace Flatten[] with Grid[] to get the triangle. *)
results.author: _L. Edson Jeffery_, Dec 17 2014
